title: Couple With Heart Person Person Medium Light Skin Tone No Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Couple With Heart (Person, Medium-Light Skin Tone, Man)
description: Illustrates a romantic couple, featuring a person with a medium-light skin tone and a man with a default (no specific skin tone) appearance, connected by a heart. This emoji symbolizes love, commitment, and a romantic bond, allowing for broader representation without specifying the man's skin tone.

A luminous, perfectly formed heart hovers between her and an unseen partner, symbolizing deep affection, romance, and partnership with a touch of tender emotion unique to Apple‚Äôs design.
